Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires the educational and vocational credits earned by incarcerated individuals are transferable upon release
Summary: Requires that curricula and educational programs provide incarcerated individuals the opportunity to earn educational or vocational credits which shall be transferable to an educational institution upon the release of the incarcerated individual.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring the educational and vocational credits earned by incarcerated individuals are transferable upon release
